course.title: Approaches to Middle Eastern Studies
course.meeting_text: M., W., at 10, plus a section meeting to be arranged.
course.description: An interdisciplinary introduction to Middle Eastern Studies focusing on the modern period. Disciplinary approaches will include exemplary texts in History, Anthropology, Religious Studies, Literature and Political Science. Required for all concentrators in The Modern Middle East. Open to all undergraduates.
course.notes: A required course primarily for undergraduates pursuing a secondary field in modern Middle Eastern Studies.
